properties.script:
out0 = spark.sql(f"""
    SELECT
    '{Config.sourceSystem}'   AS SRC_SYS_CD,
    f4801_adt.wadcto AS MFG_ORDR_TYP_CD,
    f4801_adt.wadoco AS MFG_ORDR_NUM,
    CASE WHEN LOWER(TRIM(f4801_adt.waupmj)) = 'null' OR TRIM(f4801_adt.waupmj) = '' OR TRIM(f4801_adt.waupmj) = '0' THEN NULL ELSE to_timestamp(substr(CAST(date_add(concat(substr(CAST(CAST(TRIM(f4801_adt.waupmj) AS INT) + 1900000 AS STRING),1,4),'-01-01'), CAST(substr(CAST(CAST(TRIM(f4801_adt.waupmj) AS INT) + 1900000 AS string),5) AS INT )-1) AS STRING), 1, 10),'yyyy-MM-dd') END AS CHG_DTTM,
    NULL AS ORDR_RTNG_NUM,
    NULL AS MRP_CNTRLLR_CD,
    CASE WHEN LOWER(TRIM(f4801_adt.watrdj)) = 'null' OR TRIM(f4801_adt.watrdj) = '' OR TRIM(f4801_adt.watrdj) = '0' THEN NULL ELSE to_timestamp(substr(CAST(date_add(concat(substr(CAST(CAST(TRIM(f4801_adt.watrdj) AS INT) + 1900000 AS STRING),1,4),'-01-01'), CAST(substr(CAST(CAST(TRIM(f4801_adt.watrdj) AS INT) + 1900000 AS string),5) AS INT )-1) AS STRING), 1, 10),'yyyy-MM-dd') END AS CRTD_DTTM,
    NULL AS PRD_SPVSR_CD,
    CASE WHEN LOWER(TRIM(f4801_adt.wastrx)) = 'null' OR TRIM(f4801_adt.wastrx) = '' OR TRIM(f4801_adt.wastrx) = '0' THEN NULL ELSE to_timestamp(substr(CAST(date_add(concat(substr(CAST(CAST(TRIM(f4801_adt.wastrx) AS INT) + 1900000 AS STRING),1,4),'-01-01'), CAST(substr(CAST(CAST(TRIM(f4801_adt.wastrx) AS INT) + 1900000 AS string),5) AS INT )-1) AS STRING), 1, 10),'yyyy-MM-dd') END AS ACT_RLSE_DTTM,
    CASE WHEN LOWER(TRIM(f4801_adt.wadrqj)) = 'null' OR TRIM(f4801_adt.wadrqj) = '' OR TRIM(f4801_adt.wadrqj) = '0' THEN NULL ELSE to_timestamp(substr(CAST(date_add(concat(substr(CAST(CAST(TRIM(f4801_adt.wadrqj) AS INT) + 1900000 AS STRING),1,4),'-01-01'), CAST(substr(CAST(CAST(TRIM(f4801_adt.wadrqj) AS INT) + 1900000 AS string),5) AS INT )-1) AS STRING), 1, 10),'yyyy-MM-dd') END AS PLAN_RLSE_DTTM,
    CASE WHEN LOWER(TRIM(f4801_adt.wadrqj)) = 'null' OR TRIM(f4801_adt.wadrqj) = '' OR TRIM(f4801_adt.wadrqj) = '0' THEN NULL ELSE to_timestamp(substr(CAST(date_add(concat(substr(CAST(CAST(TRIM(f4801_adt.wadrqj) AS INT) + 1900000 AS STRING),1,4),'-01-01'), CAST(substr(CAST(CAST(TRIM(f4801_adt.wadrqj) AS INT) + 1900000 AS string),5) AS INT )-1) AS STRING), 1, 10),'yyyy-MM-dd') END AS SCH_REL_DTTM,
    CASE WHEN LOWER(TRIM(f4801_adt.wastrx)) = 'null' OR TRIM(f4801_adt.wastrx) = '' OR TRIM(f4801_adt.wastrx) = '0' THEN NULL ELSE to_timestamp(substr(CAST(date_add(concat(substr(CAST(CAST(TRIM(f4801_adt.wastrx) AS INT) + 1900000 AS STRING),1,4),'-01-01'), CAST(substr(CAST(CAST(TRIM(f4801_adt.wastrx) AS INT) + 1900000 AS string),5) AS INT )-1) AS STRING), 1, 10),'yyyy-MM-dd') END AS CNFRMD_END_DTTM,
    CASE WHEN LOWER(TRIM(f4801_adt.wastrx)) = 'null' OR TRIM(f4801_adt.wastrx) = '' OR TRIM(f4801_adt.wastrx) = '0' THEN NULL ELSE to_timestamp(substr(CAST(date_add(concat(substr(CAST(CAST(TRIM(f4801_adt.wastrx) AS INT) + 1900000 AS STRING),1,4),'-01-01'), CAST(substr(CAST(CAST(TRIM(f4801_adt.wastrx) AS INT) + 1900000 AS string),5) AS INT )-1) AS STRING), 1, 10),'yyyy-MM-dd') END AS PRDTN_END_DTTM,
    CASE WHEN LOWER(TRIM(f4801_adt.wadrqj)) = 'null' OR TRIM(f4801_adt.wadrqj) = '' OR TRIM(f4801_adt.wadrqj) = '0' THEN NULL ELSE to_timestamp(substr(CAST(date_add(concat(substr(CAST(CAST(TRIM(f4801_adt.wadrqj) AS INT) + 1900000 AS STRING),1,4),'-01-01'), CAST(substr(CAST(CAST(TRIM(f4801_adt.wadrqj) AS INT) + 1900000 AS string),5) AS INT )-1) AS STRING), 1, 10),'yyyy-MM-dd') END AS END_DTTM,
    CASE WHEN LOWER(TRIM(f4801_adt.wadrqj)) = 'null' OR TRIM(f4801_adt.wadrqj) = '' OR TRIM(f4801_adt.wadrqj) = '0' THEN NULL ELSE to_timestamp(substr(CAST(date_add(concat(substr(CAST(CAST(TRIM(f4801_adt.wadrqj) AS INT) + 1900000 AS STRING),1,4),'-01-01'), CAST(substr(CAST(CAST(TRIM(f4801_adt.wadrqj) AS INT) + 1900000 AS string),5) AS INT )-1) AS STRING), 1, 10),'yyyy-MM-dd') END AS SCHD_END_DTTM,
    NULL AS ACT_STRT_DTTM,
    CASE WHEN LOWER(TRIM(f4801_adt.wastrt)) = 'null' OR TRIM(f4801_adt.wastrt) = '' OR TRIM(f4801_adt.wastrt) = '0' THEN NULL ELSE to_timestamp(substr(CAST(date_add(concat(substr(CAST(CAST(TRIM(f4801_adt.wastrt) AS INT) + 1900000 AS STRING),1,4),'-01-01'), CAST(substr(CAST(CAST(TRIM(f4801_adt.wastrt) AS INT) + 1900000 AS string),5) AS INT )-1) AS STRING), 1, 10),'yyyy-MM-dd') END AS STRT_DTTM,
    CASE WHEN LOWER(TRIM(f4801_adt.wastrt)) = 'null' OR TRIM(f4801_adt.wastrt) = '' OR TRIM(f4801_adt.wastrt) = '0' THEN NULL ELSE to_timestamp(substr(CAST(date_add(concat(substr(CAST(CAST(TRIM(f4801_adt.wastrt) AS INT) + 1900000 AS STRING),1,4),'-01-01'), CAST(substr(CAST(CAST(TRIM(f4801_adt.wastrt) AS INT) + 1900000 AS string),5) AS INT )-1) AS STRING), 1, 10),'yyyy-MM-dd') END AS SCHD_STRT_DTTM,
    CAST(TRIM(f4801_adt.wasocn) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS CNFRMD_SCRP_QTY,
    NULL AS CNFRMD_YLD_QTY,
    NULL AS DEL_IND,
    NULL AS OBJECT_NUMBER,
    NULL AS RTNG_GRP_CNTR_NUM,
    NULL AS RTNG_GRP_CD,
    TRIM(f4801_adt.watrt) AS RTNG_TYP_CD,
    NULL AS RSRVTN_NUM,
    TRIM(f4801_adt.wasrst) AS MFG_ORDR_STTS_CD,
    NULL AS MFG_ORDR_STS_TXT,
    NULL AS BOM_ALT_NUM,
    NULL AS BOM_NUM,
    TRIM(f4801_adt.watbm) AS BOM_CAT_CD,
    TRIM(f4801_adt.wamcu) AS PLNT_CD,
    TRIM(f4801_adt.waan8) AS DIR_SHIP_CUST_ADDR_NUM,
    TRIM(f4801_adt.wammcu) AS MFR_OF_FNL_SKU,
 NULL AS MATL_NUM,
 NULL AS TOT_ORDR_QTY,
 NULL AS TOT_SCRAP_QTY_IN_ORDR,
 NULL AS BASE_UOM,
 NULL AS APPL_OF_the_TASK_LIST,
 NULL AS TASK_LIST_USG,
 NULL AS MAX_LOT_SIZE,
 NULL AS TASK_LIST_UOM,
 NULL AS MIN_LOT_SIZE,
 NULL AS CHG_NUM1,
 NULL AS RESP_PLNR_GRP_OR_DEPT,
 NULL AS LOT_SIZE_DIVSR,
 NULL AS MATL_NUM1,
 NULL AS BILL_OF_MATL_STS,
 NULL AS BASE_QTY,
 NULL AS BASE_UNIT_OF_MEAS,
 NULL AS CHG_NUM2,
 NULL AS BOM_USG,
 NULL AS FROM_LOT_SIZE,
 NULL AS TO_LOT_SIZE,
 NULL AS SCHDLNG_MRGN_KEY_FOR_FLOATS,
 NULL AS SCHDLNG_TYPE,
 NULL AS FLOAT_BEF_PRDTN,
 NULL AS FLOAT_AFTER_PRDTN,
 NULL AS RLSE_PER,
 NULL AS CHG_TO_SCHD_DT_IN,
 NULL AS ID_OF_the_CAPY_RQR_REC,
 NULL AS PROJ_DEF,
 NULL AS INTRNL_CNTR1,
 NULL AS INTRNL_CNTR2,
 NULL AS CNTR_FOR_ADDL_CRITA,
 NULL AS INSP_LOT_NUM,
 NULL AS COST_VRNT_FOR_PLAN_COSTS,
 NULL AS COST_VRNT_FOR_ACTL_COSTS,
 NULL AS CMPLT_CNFRM_NUM_FOR_the_OPR,
 NULL AS INTRNL_CNTR3,
 NULL AS CNFG,
 NULL AS OBJ_ID_OF_the_RSRS1,
 NULL AS OBJ_ID_OF_the_RSRS2,
 NULL AS LVL,
 NULL AS PATH1,
 NULL AS PATH2,
 NULL AS NUM_OF_RESV,
 NULL AS ORDR_ITM_NUM,
 NULL AS LEFT_NODE_IN_CLCTV_ORDR,
 NULL AS RIGHT_NODE_OF_CLCTV_ORDR,
 NULL AS CNFRM_DEG_OF_PRCSG,
 NULL AS RTG_NUM_OF_OPS_IN_THE_ORDR,
 NULL AS GENL_CNTR_FOR_ORDR,
 NULL AS RTG_EXPLS_DTTM,
 NULL AS VLD_FROM_DTTM,
 NULL AS VLD_FROM_DTTM1,
 NULL AS BOM_EXPLS_TFR_DTTM,
 NULL AS FIN_DTTM,
 NULL AS FCST_STRT_DTTM,
 NULL AS SCHD_FCST_FIN_DTTM,
 NULL AS SCHD_FCST_STRT_DTTM,
 NULL AS ORDR_CAT,
 NULL AS REF_ORDR_NUM,
 NULL AS ENT_BY,
 NULL AS LAST_CHG_BY,
 NULL AS DESC,
 NULL AS LONG_TEXT_EXISTS,
 NULL AS CO_CD,
 NULL AS BUSN_AREA,
 NULL AS CNTL_AREA,
 NULL AS COST_CLCT_KEY,
 NULL AS ORDR_CRNCY,
 NULL AS ORDR_STS,
 NULL AS LAST_STS_CHG_DTTM,
 NULL AS STS_REACHED_SO_FAR,
 NULL AS PH_ORDR_RELS,
 NULL AS PH_ORDR_CMPLT,
 NULL AS PLAN_CMPLT_DTTM,
 NULL AS PLAN_CLS_DTTM,
 NULL AS RLSE_DTTM,
 NULL AS TECH_CMPLT_DTTM,
 NULL AS CLSE_DTTM,
 NULL AS OBJ_ID,
 NULL AS USG_OF_THE_COND_TBL,
 NULL AS APPL,
 NULL AS COST_SHT,
 NULL AS OVHD_KEY,
 NULL AS PRCSG_GRP,
 NULL AS SEQ_NUM,
 NULL AS APPLT,
 NULL AS EST_TOT_COSTS_OF_ORDR,
 NULL AS APPL_DTTM,
 NULL AS WRK_STRT_DTTM,
 NULL AS END_OF_WRK_DTTM,
 NULL AS PRFT_CTR,
 NULL AS WRK_BRKDWN_STRC_ELMNT,
 NULL AS VAR_KEY,
 NULL AS RSLTS_ANAL_KEY,
 NULL AS REQ_CO_CD,
 NULL AS ITM_NUM_IN_SLS_ORDR,
 NULL AS PRDTN_PRCS
FROM {Config.sourceDatabase}.f4801_adt
WHERE f4801_adt._deleted_ = 'F'
  
 
""")
